body: This item gains 10 ranks in one skill. This must be an Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill, unless the item has the animate ability (allowing it to choose Acrobatics) or the fly ability (allowing it to choose Fly).
name: Skill Ranks
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Skill Ranks
